definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

pinyin: ji3 zhui1 zhi3 ya1 liao2 fa3

definition: hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT)/also 高壓氧治療|高压氧治疗[gao1 ya1 yang3 zhi4 liao2]

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通過脊神經療法或者瑜伽均可獲得顯著療效。

sentences.english: The treatment proved to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 這種療法證明是成功的。

sentences.english: That is especially true for antiretroviral therapy.
sentences.chinese: 這些對於反轉錄酶療法的確相當正確。

sentences.english: The research could lead to new therapies for preventing cancer metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究將會引發癌轉移的新療法。

sentences.english: I've been tasked with psychoanalyzing Jack after his mental breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在負責對崩潰後的傑克使用精神分析療法。

sentences.english: For mild to moderate depression, psychotherapy may be the best option.
sentences.chinese: 對於輕到中度抑鬱，心理療法將是最佳治療選擇。

sentences.english: If you have any herbal supplements or remedies, please stay away from me.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有任何輔助草藥或療法，請別過來。

sentences.english: For extreme diseases, extreme methods of cure, as to restriction, are most suitable.
sentences.chinese: 對於重病，就剋制治療而言，最宜採取極端之療法。

sentences.english: Department of Rheumatology, Section for Climate Therapy, Oslo University Hospital, Oslo, Norway.
sentences.chinese: 挪威奧斯陸大學醫院，氣候療法部，風溼免疫科。

sentences.english: Conclusion Balancing acupuncture is superior to conventional acupuncture in treating stiff neck.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察平衡針配合運動療法治療落枕臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Morita psychotherapy was developed by Japanese psychiatrist Shoma Morita in the early part of the twentieth century.
sentences.chinese: 森田療法是20世紀前葉由日本森田正馬教授創立的。

sentences.english: Docetaxel has demonstrated superiority compared with best supportive care.
sentences.chinese: 多西他賽證明效果優於最好的支持療法。

sentences.english: LDL cholesterol should be the primary target of lipid lowering treatments.
sentences.chinese: LDL脂蛋白應該作爲脂蛋白降低療法的主要靶標。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of treatment based syndrome differentiation for bronchial asthma.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中醫療法辨證治療支氣管哮喘的療效。

sentences.english: Do you have a good remedy for fatigued eyes?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有好的治療法可以治我疲勞的眼睛？

sentences.english: We remind clinician that it must be cautious when they applicate hormone replacement therapy.
sentences.chinese: 提醒臨牀醫生應慎用激素替代療法。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
